InstallationÂ¶

In your Terminal:

  1. Clone the HeartView GitHub repository into a directory of your choice.

$ git clone https://github.com/cbslneu/heartview.git

  1. Set up and activate a virtual environment in the heartview project directory.

$ cd heartview
$ virtualenv venv -p python3

Note: virtualenv can be installed via pip3 install virtualenv.

  1. Activate your newly created virtual environment.

$ source venv/bin/activate

  1. Install all project dependencies. (This may take a while.)

$ pip3 install -r requirements.txt
